1566399180_17KiwHwKMhcEVfPrnwf4wfggjmrsQ.body: If you're running Linux and have netstat, you can netstat -tup to see what exactly you're connected to.

> So if all <pid>/python3 entries only ever point to localhost:<whichever> then I'm good?

Correct.

1566019704_1D6UcmziWg55aXV6TnCksXpjsFJ4g.body: Note that the "3 dot" menu and the mute function are not shown on the ZeroHello summary page. You have to either click on the message or go to ZeroTalk itself, where you'll see the poster's name and have access to the "3 dot" menu and the mute function.
